11.content:
You are cleaning out the shed in your back yard as part of your weekend house keeping. You notice that as you are walking over a rug in the room it sounds hollow. Curious you lift up the carpet to find a wooden panel with a door knob on it. You lift up the nob and are instantly hit with a puff of dust and a dirt smell. Once the dust clears, You see a staircase leading to god knows where but you follow it anyways.
You get to the bottom of the stairs and see a giant metal pod that looks like a tanning bed with a note on it. You walk over to the note and it reads...

Dear finder of this machine,

I doctor James Newton, have created this machine to give people a second chance at life or for those who just wanna try out someone else's life. This machine allows you to leave your body and enter someone else's and in a sense possess them. There are a few rules. First off, once you possess someone you are stuck in there body for at least an hour and then you can leave or stay as you wish, but if you stay in that body for more than twenty-four hours you will be stuck like that forever and there spirit will be put in your body and think that they were always you. Secondly, you can possess a body part but you are under complete control of the person who's body part you are in until the hour is up then you can switch back or stay twenty-four hour rule still applies here. For animals the limit before you are stuck like that for ever is a week in case you forget to switch back same goes for inanimate objects. Other wise lie down in the machine press the red button and have fun.

P.S. your body will go on life support while you are not in it so you you don't have to worry about that.

Doctor James Newton

As you read this the thought of being somebody else sounded really good So you go lie down in the pod. It's a lot more comfortable than you would have thought and you press the red button. "Welcome Master." The machine says in a woman's voice. "What would you like to possess today?" It asks. Then a screen lights up and shows four options. Which button do you press?

115.content:
The screen lights up and has two buttons. One says cancel, the other says Proceed. It is a rather simple interface. You so want to press the cancel button and go back to your day, however you are too curious.

You tentatively reach up to the button that simply says proceed. You are unsure of what will happen. Your finger shakes as you slowly press it. Suddenly the machine whirs to life. It closes in around you preventing you from leaving. The machine begins making a loud rhythmic whirring noise. The lights inside the machine start to turn on and off in time to the noise of the machine.

Soon you feel like you are moving in sync with the strange whirring rhythm. You start to feel dizzy. Your vision and sense start to fade. You aren't sure if you are passing out or not. Your head however doesn't feel foggy at all, just your senses.

Soon you can hear, feel, or see absolutely nothing. You try to move your arms but you have none. None that you can sense or control anyway. Everything is pitch black and noiseless. It is maddening.
115.title: You choose (in case you don't any of these...

choices: Try harder to get back to your body
1151.content:
You start thrashing about with all of your might. Moving the arms you don't have, kicking the legs you don't have, and straining with the eyes you don't have. You desperately try to claw your way out of this void. You spend some time doing this and start to feel like you are making progress.

As you are straining to see with the eyes you don't have the room under the shed comes back into view. You can make out the dusty walls with the machine in the center. You flail about and start to feel your arms again. You hold a hand up to your face and see nothing but a hazy outline of some kind of energy.

You look back and the machine. You reach up to try to touch it but your hand goes right through it. You float right through it to the center where you can see your body. You watch as your chest rises and falls as your body breathes. You remember the note that indicated you would be on life support.

You try to re-enter your body but like the walls and the machine you have nothing to grab onto.
1151.title: Try to wake up

11512.content:
You give up trying to get back into your body. You remember that this is a possession machine. You reason that you must posses someone for an hour before you can go back. You take some time to get used to being a disembodies spirit. You can't really walk as your feet go right through the ground. Your feet are kind of rough and hazy anyway.

It takes you a bit to get used to but you realize you can just float around by willing it. You can go in any direction and can even go fairly fast. You zoom straight up through the shed and into the open air of your backyard. You are having fun just flying around. Nobody was really out.

Finally you see some of your neighbors. A few houses down one of your neighbor's teenage daughter is in the backyard with a few of her friends. You recognize the girl but don't know her name. They are swimming in the backyard swimming pool.

You stop over them and look down. Part of you is afraid they'll see or somehow sense you. You fly down a bit closer and wave your 'hand' in front of one of the girl's faces. To your relief they don't sense you or see you.
11512.title: Go find someone

115121.content:
These are the first people you've come across. Your family was all away for a few hours. You wanted to get this done before any of them came back and this seemed like an innocuous choice. You'd swim and splash for an hour then figure out how to get back.

You decided not to pick the neighbor girl but instead went with one of her friends. You reasoned that if her parents came by it would be easier to not be a family member. You picked the tallest girl of the bunch. She was almost your height which you reasoned would make it easier. She was also the only one of the three wearing a one piece instead of a bikini.

You reached out to touch her. For the first time since you were disembodied you felt something. It wasn't her body as your hand passed right through her head. But when you reached into her chest there was something in her core, something you could feel.

You weren't sure what to do so you reached out with both hands and grabbed it. You held it tight unsure of what it was. It was anchoring your to her. You held it tighter and pulled it toward you. This also had the effect of pulling you into her.

It was quick. Your vision lined up with her head and her eyes. Suddenly you felt like you were wrapped in a warm bag of some sort. It took you a minute to realized that your disembodied spirit felt a cold detachment. This warm bag was in fact a body. You could feel through the warm bag. You moved your arms and saw the girl's arm move with it. Only then did you get the full effect of actually being her, it had already happened and you misinterpreted the sensation.

You looked down, you were wearing a blue one piece bathing suit with definite breasts popping out in front of you. You could feel the damp suit through them. You then noticed the cold damp suit on your now very flat stomach.

Finally you noticed the bottom of the bathing suit tightly between your legs with no obstruction's whatsoever. You had no penis at all. You absently ran your fingers over your groin to confirm.
115121.title: Posess one of them

115122.content:
You decide that this isn't the best choice. There are three of them so certainly the other two will realize something is up. You buzz around for a bit. You see a neighbor mowing his lawn, you aren't sure you want to mow someones lawn for them however. You need to find a person to possess.

You could try to find someone in your family, you know them and could impersonate one of them well, however they are all away on some errands so it might be hard to go find them.

You also then realize you can enter people's houses too. It is a hot day so many people could just be sitting in their houses.
115122.title: Keep moving

1152.content:
As you are freaking out in a senseless black void, you realize that you start to feel something. It takes you a while to understand what you are feeling. It seems to be some new sense you've never had before so you don't know how to describe it.

As you start to gain understanding of this new sense however you realize that there is some sort of vast field of tiny points of energy. Even though you cant see it with your eyes, the idea reminds you of looking up into a vast starry sky. Countless points of energy in a dark void.

As you are taking it all in you realize that some are close to you and very bright, others are tiny and far away from you.

You decide to focus on the closest brightest point. As you focus on it the others fade away into the background. You focus on the point of energy and realize suddenly that it is a person. You aren't able to discern who it is in the normal way. You can't see the face but as you focus you start to get an idea for who it is.
1152.title: Explore new senses
